mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_inventorybase (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, INVENTORYNO, SKUID, QUANTITY, REALQUANTITY, STATUS, AUDITOR, SUBMITTIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventoryno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_wms_inventorybase set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVENTORYNO = #{inventoryno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALQUANTITY = #{realquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBMITTIME = #{submittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, INVENTORYNO, SKUID, QUANTITY, REALQUANTITY, STATUS, AUDITOR, SUBMITTIME from t_wms_inventorybase where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, INVENTORYNO, SKUID, QUANTITY, REALQUANTITY, STATUS, AUDITOR, SUBMITTIME from t_wms_inventorybase
